item.title: Buffer Overflow
item.description:
Buffer overflow #

Buffer overflow happen when the program storing data more than a buffer can handle causing the data to “overflow” to other part of the program and possibly overwriting program’s data and give the attacker the ability to do arbitrary write bounded to how much data the program ask. Below is a deliberately vulnerable to buffer overflow C program:
